```{r knr}

```

```{r Moenster}
# Legger inn regex m√∏nster
moenster <- '\\s*\\([\\d\\s-]*\\d*\\)\\s*$'
```

# 1. Sysselsatte Etter Arbeidssted

```{r}
syssel_raw <- ApiData(
  urlToData = "07984",
  Region = knr,
  ContentsCode = "SysselsatteArb",
  NACE2007 = TRUE,
  Alder = "15-74",
  Kjonn = TRUE,
  Tid = c(
    as.character(2008:2020)))
```

```{r}
syssel_raw <- syssel_raw$dataset %>% 
  tibble() %>% 
  rename(
    knr = Region,
    aar = Tid)
```

```{r}
syssel_raw <- syssel_raw %>% 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = NACE2007,
    values_from = value)
```

```{r}
syssel <- syssel_raw %>% 
  select(1106, 1135, 1145, 1146, 1149, 1151, 1160, 1216, 4612, 1219, 4613, 1221, 4614, 1222, 4615, 1223, 4616, 1224, 4617, )
```


```{r}
syssel <- syssel %>% 
  mutate(
    knavn = str_replace(knavn, moenster, ""))
```
